title: Lugs Not Drugs Adjustable Fleece Caps
content:
Lugs Not Drugs teamed up with Zephyr Line to make a run of cozy winter fleece caps with an adjustable cinch. These upcycled fleece custom 4-panel unstructured caps can be worn on and off the bike and is available in a dark olive green fleece crown with a darkish salmon bill. The flexible bill is also a bit longer and wider for more coverage from the elements.Â  Multi-colored bungee cord and black button adjuster to get the fit just right. Huckleberry patch sewn on by hand. Made by Zephyr Line Workshop of Ohio.

See more at Lugs Not Drugs.
